name: mignon
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a very high-quality piece of meat, especially beef, or sometimes fish: the mignon of veal You'll need four mignons of prime New York sirloin.
More examplesFewer examplesThe classic Rossini is usually made with ﬁlet mignon but in this case I used a mignon of prime sirloin.The bourbon-glazed prime pork mignon is prepared to perfection. The dish consisted of beautifully cut mignons of swordfish.My companion chose the seared sea bass mignons with crisply fried shallots.
